amendment.description: Amendment offered as a substitute to the Fazio amendment (A005) transfers $15 million to the Congressional Research Service to enable CRS to assume the functions of the Office of Technology Assessment. \ Amendment subsequently failed with rejection of the Fazio amendment (A005). See Roll No. 405.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Fazio amendment to reduce the appropriation for the Library of Congress by $15 million and to increase the appropriation for the Congressional Research Service by an equal amount, to enable CRS to assume the functions of the Office of Technology Assessment.

action.text: Substitute (A006) offered by Mr. Houghton to the Fazio amendment (A005).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houghton amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 201 (Roll no. 403).
